long_description: Wind-resistant without being stiff or heavy, the Salomon Fast Wing jacket excels on trail runs and mountain speed hikes. Wear it during your warm-up or unpack it at the top for soft, light protection. Climawind(TM) ripstop polyester offers wind-resistance while staying breathable. Full-length zipper offers immediate ventilation; thumbholes keep sleeves in place and add warmth. Salomon Fast Wing Jacket features reflective details for enhanced visibility in low light.
short_description: Wind-resistant without being stiff or heavy, the Salomon Fast Wing jacket excels on trail runs and mountain speed hikes. Wear it during your warm-up or unpack it at the top for soft, light protection.
